metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31615 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer, where a local user with basic capabilities can cause a null-pointer dereference, which may lead to denial of service. Tal Lossos discovered that the NVIDIA graphics drivers incorrectly handled certain memory operations, leading to a null-pointer dereference. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> some binary drivers are no longer support by NVidia, so they are marked as ignored here

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
